name: Organic Hemp Protein Podwer - 1kg
description:
Hemp seeds have the most complete edible and usable protein in the vegetable kingdom.  

Hemp Protein is a raw, cold-pressed vegan alternative to the processed, dairy-based proteins available on the market.

Hemp protein contains all 21 known amino acids, including the 8 essential ones adult bodies cannot produce. 
Proteins are considered complete when they contain all the essential amino acids in sufficient quantities and ratios to meet the body's needs. 

The less processed and closer to their natural state foods are, the more supportive they are to our body's natural processes.

Hemp seed protein can supply any diet with a vegetarian source of essential fatty acids, antioxidants, vitamins, minerals, fibre, chlorophyll, and a complete, balanced gluten-free source of the essential amino acids.

name: Organic Hemp Seed & Oats Breakfast Cereal - 400g
description:
Our delicious and ultra-convenient 'Organic Hemp Seed & Oats' breakfast cereal is an excellent and delicious way to start your day! 

Hemp seeds contain ideal ratios of fatty acids and amino acids for human dietary requirements, is free from cholesterol and high in easily absorbed protein.

Completely vegan, it's the perfect 'whole-snack' any time you want to avoid a bad food decision...or just have a delicious, personalized snack.

    * No additives
    * No sugar or salt
    * Cholesterol-free
    * High fibre
    * GM-Free
    * Vegan Society Approved
    * Low GI

name: Organic Shelled Hemp Seed - 1Kg
description:
Widely regarded as nature's most complete and balanced singe source of nutrition, Hemp seed contains every known amino acid and essential fatty acid - including the omega oils 3, 6 and 9 - alongside easily absorbed globular protein and a range of key vitamins and minerals. 

Hemp seed has a nutritional balanced close to the ideal profile for human dietary requirements. There are countless scientific studies showing myriad benefits from this rich natural food resource.

Hemp seed has a light nutty flavour, and is easy and fun to get creative with. Try shelled hemp seed in soups, smoothies, curries, sauces, cakes or just sprinkle it on salads, ice-cream, fruit, or even add it to toast and sandwiches with your normal spreads.

name: Daily Colon Detox - Organic Hemp Fibre - 100g
description:
Colon health is paramount to wellbeing and is statistically related to many major diseases. In addition, the colon performs a dual function, serving as both an entry and exit point for food and waste.

A clean, healthy colon will absorb more nutrients. The high insoluble fibre content of DCD in the gritty form we make from hemp seed shells, helps remove toxic 'compacted waste' caused by eating processed foods, meat and dairy and other foods.

Although DCD will help to regulate bowel movement, don't expect instant results or miracles. If you want a full detox, take double the dose recommended on the pack and cut out processed foods, meat, dairy etc.

For a gentle daily detox to compensate for daily toxins from your diet, once a day is sufficient and over a period of time toxin removal will outstrip new toxin build up.

Combine this with regular intake of essential amino acids and essential fatty acids (all found in hemp seed), and you are supplying your body with important tools to maintain many essential systems.
